Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sickening \Sick"en*ing\, a. Causing sickness; specif., causing surfeit or disgust; nauseating. -- {Sick"en*ing*ly}, adv. [1913 Webster]
sickeningly adv : in a disgusting manner or to a disgusting degree; "the beggar was disgustingly filthy" [syn: {disgustingly}, {distastefully}, {revoltingly}]
